name: FlatLine (itch)
description:
FlatLine is a fast paced 2D platformer!

You play as an Eletrical Pulse, and your objective is to get to the end of the  Transmission Line, have fun!

This game was started at the 2018 Global Game Jam ( you can find it here: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/flatline) but I decided to continue working on  it, and release it on mobile!

Also, you can follow me on Twitter for updates! Here's the link: 

https://twitter.com/Rodrigo_Devora
